# winBack

**Type Property**

A win-back offer for an auto-renewable subscription.

## Declaration

```swift
@backDeployed(before: iOS 18.0, macOS 15.0, tvOS 18.0, watchOS 11.0, visionOS 2.0)
static var winBack: Transaction.OfferType { get }
```

## Discussion

For more information about win-back offers, see [https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/manage-subscriptions/set-up-win-back-offers].

The raw value of the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/OfferType-swift.struct/winBack] offer type is `4`.

## Getting offer types

- **introductory**: An introductory offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **promotional**: A promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **code**: An offer code.
